description.name: finchpay
description.tagline: Instant Approval High Risk Merchant Gateway (finchpay.io)
description.long: Instant approval High Risk Merchant Gateway with instant payouts to your USDT BEP20 wallet using finchpay.io infrastructure
features: Accept all major credit and debit cards including Visa and Mastercard directly on your site
Instant payouts to your USDT BEP20 wallet
ZERO Chargebacks all payments are final.
